property.name: title
property.label: Component Title
property.description: This is the text that will be displayed as the component title. If blank, this title will not display.

property.name: titleNoGroups
property.label: Component Title - No Groups
property.description: This is the text that will be displayed as a title when a user has not joined any groups. If blank, this title will not display.

property.name: groupsIntro
property.label: Groups Intro
property.default: Groups are a great way to get connected!
property.description: This is shown to the user when they are not in any groups and there aren't any recommended groups set.

property.name: groupsIntroWithRecommendations
property.label: Groups Intro With Recommended Groups
property.default: Groups are a great way to get connected! Check out the recommended groups below!
property.description: This is shown to the user when they are not in any groups and there are recommended groups set.

property.name: moreGroupsButtonText
property.label: More Groups Button Text
property.description: This button is shown when the user is in groups and has more groups than what is shown.

property.name: exploreMoreGroupsButtonText
property.label: Explore More Groups Button Text
property.description: This button is shown when the user is not in any groups.

property.name: customClass
property.label: Custom Class Name
property.description: Custom CSS class name. Usually remains blank.
